title: Do we even have forum mods?
body: I see Sackboy giving everyone shit all the time but no punishments, i mean i'm no sunshine either but Sackboy? Surely he should've been banned by now.

replies.body: i just looked at his history, it's not even that bad, i don't know why you're so upset

"Honestly if your W/L ratio is below 80% stop playing that champ until you get good." - Sackboy

Not that bad huh? He says shit like this to insult people all the time, and i'm not upset, i'm just saying.
if you seriously get mad over something like that, i'd have to say, you are indeed a little bitch
I'm not mad, how am i mad? I'm just saying constantly insulting people should result in a suspension or ban depending on what he's saying.
just report him or blacklist him
He was partially banned in March but his ban finished on April 2nd so he's free for now.

Yes we have mods, if you post a thread sitting in the wrong sub-board it will mostly get instantly deleted disregarding whatever the content was.

The mod will also delete a few other threads if he happen to find them offending. Otherwise yeah, Board doesn't seem to have much mod action, prob because barely anyone uses OCE board so nobody really cares. On NA mod is more active.

Sackboy is not all that bad of a person, he just tends to troll on the forum.

Pittballs was banned and he never really said bad things to people, all he did was try to be funny by saying dumb things, Sackboy on the other hand insults people constantly but he never gets banned, he doesn't try to be funny all he just sits there and insults people all day.

So tell me why was Pittballs banned but Sackboy has not been touched?
because sack boy is our lord and saviour roasting idiots and putting scrubs in their place
